title: All My Heart
description: All My Heart If you spend half your life chasing down vengeance what do you do when the thing your hunting turns out to be someone you love? If you’re sanity depends on the solace you’ll find in retribution, is one terrifying discovery enough to get you to stop searching? Rebecca has given Devin half her heart and all her love since the moment he was arrested. Now it’s up to him to decide if he’s capable of the same dedication when new clues point to her involvement in murder. With so much on the line can Devin sort out the chaos and stop his tailspin before he loses everything? Can he hand over all his heart and trust he’s making the right choice?
author: Danielle Stewart
